basic.description: An overview of the evolution and function of cognitive processes. Emphasis will be placed on understanding how natural selection shaped cognition across species.  Topics such as memory, decision making and communication will be examined from a behavioural ecology and experimental psychology perspective.  Neuroscience and developmental psychology research will complement each topic. Lecture/Seminar 2 hrs.
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Comparative Neurocognition
